metadata.Title: CVE-2017-18212 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in JerryScript 1.0. There is a heap-based bufferover-read in the lit_read_code_unit_from_hex function inlit/lit-char-helpers.c via a RegExp("[\x0"); payload.

criterions.comment: iotjs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
